title: Support HLS version 7 so Enterprises can move to Fragmented MP4 backed streams
body: Apple announced support for Fragmented MP4 backed HLS Streams under HLS version 7: https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2016/504/ at WWDC 2016.

comments.body: Thank you for the suggestion. HLS v7 is supported (with the exception of certain optional features) in current Insider Preview builds. We would appreciate any feedback or specifics should you encounter any incompatibilities. Note that DRM does not yet interop in that we support CTR as opposed to CBC, but this is on our roadmap to address.
Just to note that this stream doesn't play on Edge nor in Windows 10 apps.
